dn14:1.17.7: Ayanca dasasahassi lokadhatu sankampati sampakampati sampavedhati. Appamano ca ularo obhaso loke patubhavati atikkammeva devanam devanubhavam.
dn14:1.17.9: Dhammata esa, bhikkhave, yada bodhisatto matukucchim okkanto hoti, cattaro nam devaputta catuddisam rakkhaya upagacchanti: ‘ma nam bodhisattam va bodhisattamataram va manusso va amanusso va koci va vihethesi’ti.
dn14:1.18.1: Dhammata esa, bhikkhave, yada bodhisatto matukucchim okkanto hoti, pakatiya silavati bodhisattamata hoti, virata panatipata, virata adinnadana, virata kamesumicchacara, virata musavada, virata suramerayamajjappamadatthana.
dn14:1.19.1: Dhammata esa, bhikkhave, yada bodhisatto matukucchim okkanto hoti, na bodhisattamatu purisesu manasam uppajjati kamagunupasamhitam, anatikkamaniya ca bodhisattamata hoti kenaci purisena rattacittena.
dn14:1.20.1: Dhammata esa, bhikkhave, yada bodhisatto matukucchim okkanto hoti, labhini bodhisattamata hoti pancannam kamagunanam. Sa pancahi kamagunehi samappita samangibhuta paricareti.
dn14:1.21.1: Dhammata esa, bhikkhave, yada bodhisatto matukucchim okkanto hoti, na bodhisattamatu kocideva abadho uppajjati. Sukhini bodhisattamata hoti akilantakaya, bodhisattanca bodhisattamata tirokucchigatam passati sabbangapaccangim ahinindriyam.
dn14:1.21.2: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, mani veluriyo subho jatima atthamso suparikammakato accho vippasanno anavilo sabbakarasampanno. Tatrassa suttam avutam nilam va pitam va lohitam va odatam va pandusuttam va.
dn14:1.21.3: Tamenam cakkhuma puriso hatthe karitva paccavekkheyya: ‘ayam kho mani veluriyo subho jatima atthamso suparikammakato accho vippasanno anavilo sabbakarasampanno. Tatridam suttam avutam nilam va pitam va lohitam va odatam va pandusuttam va’ti.
dn14:1.21.4: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, yada bodhisatto matukucchim okkanto hoti, na bodhisattamatu kocideva abadho uppajjati, sukhini bodhisattamata hoti akilantakaya, bodhisattanca bodhisattamata tirokucchigatam passati sabbangapaccangim ahinindriyam.
dn14:1.22.1: Dhammata esa, bhikkhave, sattahajate bodhisatte bodhisattamata kalam karoti tusitam kayam upapajjati.
dn14:1.23.1: Dhammata esa, bhikkhave, yatha anna itthika nava va dasa va mase gabbham kucchina pariharitva vijayanti, na hevam bodhisattam bodhisattamata vijayati. Daseva masani bodhisattam bodhisattamata kucchina pariharitva vijayati.
dn14:1.24.1: Dhammata esa, bhikkhave, yatha anna itthika nisinna va nipanna va vijayanti, na hevam bodhisattam bodhisattamata vijayati. Thitava bodhisattam bodhisattamata vijayati.
dn14:1.25.1: Dhammata esa, bhikkhave, yada bodhisatto matukucchimha nikkhamati, deva pathamam patigganhanti, paccha manussa.
dn14:1.26.1: Dhammata esa, bhikkhave, yada bodhisatto matukucchimha nikkhamati, appattova bodhisatto pathavim hoti, cattaro nam devaputta patiggahetva matu purato thapenti: ‘attamana, devi, hohi; mahesakkho te putto uppanno’ti.
dn14:1.27.1: Dhammata esa, bhikkhave, yada bodhisatto matukucchimha nikkhamati, visadova nikkhamati amakkhito udena amakkhito semhena amakkhito ruhirena amakkhito kenaci asucina suddho visado.
dn14:1.27.2: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, maniratanam kasike vatthe nikkhittam neva maniratanam kasikam vattham makkheti, napi kasikam vattham maniratanam makkheti.
dn14:1.27.5: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, yada bodhisatto matukucchimha nikkhamati, visadova nikkhamati amakkhito, udena amakkhito semhena amakkhito ruhirena amakkhito kenaci asucina suddho visado.
dn14:1.28.1: Dhammata esa, bhikkhave, yada bodhisatto matukucchimha nikkhamati, dve udakassa dhara antalikkha patubhavanti—eka sitassa eka unhassa yena bodhisattassa udakakiccam karonti matu ca.
dn14:1.29.1: Dhammata esa, bhikkhave, sampatijato bodhisatto samehi padehi patitthahitva uttarabhimukho sattapadavitiharena gacchati setamhi chatte anudhariyamane, sabba ca disa anuviloketi, asabhim vacam bhasati ‘aggohamasmi lokassa, jetthohamasmi lokassa, setthohamasmi lokassa, ayamantima jati, natthi dani punabbhavo’ti.
dn14:1.30.1: Dhammata esa, bhikkhave, yada bodhisatto matukucchimha nikkhamati, atha sadevake loke samarake sabrahmake sassamanabrahmaniya pajaya sadevamanussaya appamano ularo obhaso patubhavati, atikkammeva devanam devanubhavam.
dn14:1.30.2: Yapi ta lokantarika agha asamvuta andhakara andhakaratimisa, yatthapime candimasuriya evammahiddhika evammahanubhava abhaya nanubhonti, tatthapi appamano ularo obhaso patubhavati atikkammeva devanam devanubhavam.
dn14:1.30.3: Yepi tattha satta upapanna, tepi tenobhasena annamannam sanjananti: ‘annepi kira, bho, santi satta idhupapanna’ti.
dn14:1.30.4: Ayanca dasasahassi lokadhatu sankampati sampakampati sampavedhati appamano ca ularo obhaso loke patubhavati atikkammeva devanam devanubhavam.
dn14:1.31.1: Jate kho pana, bhikkhave, vipassimhi kumare bandhumato ranno pativedesum:
dn14:1.31.2: ‘putto te, deva, jato, tam devo passatu’ti.
dn14:1.31.3: Addasa kho, bhikkhave, bandhuma raja vipassim kumaram, disva nemitte brahmane amantapetva etadavoca:
dn14:1.31.5: Addasamsu kho, bhikkhave, nemitta brahmana vipassim kumaram, disva bandhumantam rajanam etadavocum:
dn14:1.31.6: ‘attamano, deva, hohi, mahesakkho te putto uppanno, labha te, maharaja, suladdham te, maharaja, yassa te kule evarupo putto uppanno.
dn14:1.31.7: Ayanhi, deva, kumaro dvattimsamahapurisalakkhanehi samannagato, yehi samannagatassa mahapurisassa dveva gatiyo bhavanti ananna.
dn14:1.31.8: Sace agaram ajjhavasati, raja hoti cakkavatti dhammiko dhammaraja caturanto vijitavi janapadatthavariyappatto sattaratanasamannagato.
dn14:1.31.10: Seyyathidam—cakkaratanam hatthiratanam assaratanam maniratanam itthiratanam gahapatiratanam parinayakaratanameva sattamam.
dn14:1.31.11: Parosahassam kho panassa putta bhavanti sura virangarupa parasenappamaddana.
dn14:1.31.12: So imam pathavim sagarapariyantam adandena asatthena dhammena abhivijiya ajjhavasati.
dn14:1.31.13: Sace kho pana agarasma anagariyam pabbajati, araham hoti sammasambuddho loke vivatacchado.
dn14:1.32.1: Katamehi cayam, deva, kumaro dvattimsamahapurisalakkhanehi samannagato, yehi samannagatassa mahapurisassa dveva gatiyo bhavanti ananna.
dn14:1.32.2: Sace agaram ajjhavasati, raja hoti cakkavatti dhammiko dhammaraja caturanto vijitavi janapadatthavariyappatto sattaratanasamannagato.
dn14:1.32.4: Seyyathidam—cakkaratanam hatthiratanam assaratanam maniratanam itthiratanam gahapatiratanam parinayakaratanameva sattamam.
dn14:1.32.5: Parosahassam kho panassa putta bhavanti sura virangarupa parasenappamaddana.
dn14:1.32.6: So imam pathavim sagarapariyantam adandena asatthena dhammena abhivijiya ajjhavasati.
dn14:1.32.7: Sace kho pana agarasma anagariyam pabbajati, araham hoti sammasambuddho loke vivatacchado. Ayanhi, deva, kumaro suppatitthitapado. Yam payam, deva, kumaro suppatitthitapado. Idampissa mahapurisassa mahapurisalakkhanam bhavati.
dn14:1.32.8: Imassa, deva, kumarassa hettha padatalesu cakkani jatani sahassarani sanemikani sanabhikani sabbakaraparipurani. Yampi imassa, deva, kumarassa hettha padatalesu cakkani jatani sahassarani sanemikani sanabhikani sabbakaraparipurani, idampissa mahapurisassa mahapurisalakkhanam bhavati.
dn14:1.32.15: Ayanhi, deva, kumaro thitakova anonamanto ubhohi panitalehi jannukani parimasati parimajjati …pe…
dn14:1.32.18: Ayanhi, deva, kumaro sukhumacchavi; sukhumatta chaviya rajojallam kaye na upalimpati …pe…
dn14:1.32.19: Ayanhi, deva, kumaro ekekalomo; ekekani lomani lomakupesu jatani …pe…
dn14:1.32.20: Ayanhi, deva, kumaro uddhaggalomo; uddhaggani lomani jatani nilani anjanavannani kundalavattani dakkhinavattakajatani …pe…
dn14:1.32.25: Ayanhi, deva, kumaro nigrodhaparimandalo yavatakvassa kayo tavatakvassa byamo, yavatakvassa byamo, tavatakvassa kayo …pe…
dn14:1.32.37: Imassa, deva, kumarassa unna bhamukantare jata odata mudutulasannibha. Yampi imassa, deva, kumarassa unna bhamukantare jata odata mudutulasannibha, idampimassa mahapurisassa mahapurisalakkhanam bhavati.
dn14:1.32.38: Ayanhi, deva, kumaro unhisasiso. Yam payam, deva, kumaro unhisasiso, idampissa mahapurisassa mahapurisalakkhanam bhavati.
dn14:1.33.1: Imehi kho ayam, deva, kumaro dvattimsamahapurisalakkhanehi samannagato, yehi samannagatassa mahapurisassa dveva gatiyo bhavanti ananna.
dn14:1.33.2: Sace agaram ajjhavasati, raja hoti cakkavatti dhammiko dhammaraja caturanto vijitavi janapadatthavariyappatto sattaratanasamannagato.
dn14:1.33.4: Seyyathidam—cakkaratanam hatthiratanam assaratanam maniratanam itthiratanam gahapatiratanam parinayakaratanameva sattamam.
dn14:1.33.5: Parosahassam kho panassa putta bhavanti sura virangarupa parasenappamaddana.
dn14:1.33.6: So imam pathavim sagarapariyantam adandena asatthena dhammena abhivijiya ajjhavasati.
dn14:1.33.7: Sace kho pana agarasma anagariyam pabbajati, araham hoti sammasambuddho loke vivatacchado’ti.
dn14:1.33.9: Atha kho, bhikkhave, bandhuma raja nemitte brahmane ahatehi vatthehi acchadapetva sabbakamehi santappesi.
dn14:1.34.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, bandhuma raja vipassissa kumarassa dhatiyo upatthapesi.
dn14:1.34.2: Anna khiram payenti, anna nhapenti, anna dharenti, anna ankena pariharanti.
dn14:1.34.3: Jatassa kho pana, bhikkhave, vipassissa kumarassa setacchattam dharayittha diva ceva rattinca:
dn14:1.34.4: ‘ma nam sitam va unham va tinam va rajo va ussavo va badhayittha’ti.
dn14:1.34.5: Jato kho pana, bhikkhave, vipassi kumaro bahuno janassa piyo ahosi manapo.
dn14:1.34.6: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, uppalam va padumam va pundarikam va bahuno janassa piyam manapam;
dn14:1.34.7: evameva kho, bhikkhave, vipassi kumaro bahuno janassa piyo ahosi manapo.
dn14:1.35.1: Jato kho pana, bhikkhave, vipassi kumaro manjussaro ca ahosi vaggussaro ca madhurassaro ca pemaniyassaro ca.
dn14:1.35.2: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, himavante pabbate karavika nama sakunajati manjussara ca vaggussara ca madhurassara ca pemaniyassara ca;
dn14:1.35.3: evameva kho, bhikkhave, vipassi kumaro manjussaro ca ahosi vaggussaro ca madhurassaro ca pemaniyassaro ca.
dn14:1.36.1: Jatassa kho pana, bhikkhave, vipassissa kumarassa kammavipakajam dibbacakkhu paturahosi yena sudam samanta yojanam passati diva ceva rattinca.
dn14:1.37.1: Jato kho pana, bhikkhave, vipassi kumaro animisanto pekkhati seyyathapi deva tavatimsa.
dn14:1.37.2: ‘Animisanto kumaro pekkhati’ti kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa kumarassa ‘vipassi vipassi’ tveva samanna udapadi.
dn14:1.37.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, bandhuma raja atthakarane nisinno vipassim kumaram anke nisidapetva atthe anusasati.
dn14:1.37.4: Tatra sudam, bhikkhave, vipassi kumaro pituanke nisinno viceyya viceyya atthe panayati nayena.
dn14:1.37.5: Viceyya viceyya kumaro atthe panayati nayenati kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa kumarassa bhiyyoso mattaya ‘vipassi vipassi’ tveva samanna udapadi.
dn14:1.38.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, bandhuma raja vipassissa kumarassa tayo pasade karapesi, ekam vassikam ekam hemantikam ekam gimhikam;
dn14:1.38.3: Tatra sudam, bhikkhave, vipassi kumaro vassike pasade cattaro mase nippurisehi turiyehi paricarayamano na hetthapasadam orohatiti.
dn14:2.1.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassi kumaro bahunam vassanam bahunam vassasatanam bahunam vassasahassanam accayena sarathim amantesi:
dn14:2.1.2: ‘yojehi, samma sarathi, bhaddani bhaddani yanani uyyanabhumim gacchama subhumidassanaya’ti.
dn14:2.1.3: ‘Evam, deva’ti kho, bhikkhave, sarathi vipassissa kumarassa patissutva bhaddani bhaddani yanani yojetva vipassissa kumarassa pativedesi:
dn14:2.1.4: ‘yuttani kho te, deva, bhaddani bhaddani yanani,
dn14:2.1.6: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassi kumaro bhaddam bhaddam yanam abhiruhitva bhaddehi bhaddehi yanehi uyyanabhumim niyyasi.
dn14:2.2.1: Addasa kho, bhikkhave, vipassi kumaro uyyanabhumim niyyanto purisam jinnam gopanasivankam bhoggam dandaparayanam pavedhamanam gacchantam aturam gatayobbanam.
dn14:2.2.4: Kesapissa na yatha annesam, kayopissa na yatha annesan’ti.
dn14:2.2.7: ‘Eso kho, deva, jinno nama. Na dani tena ciram jivitabbam bhavissati’ti.
dn14:2.2.8: ‘Kim pana, samma sarathi, ahampi jaradhammo, jaram anatito’ti?
dn14:2.2.9: ‘Tvanca, deva, mayancamha sabbe jaradhamma, jaram anatita’ti.
dn14:2.2.10: ‘Tena hi, samma sarathi, alam danajja uyyanabhumiya. Itova antepuram paccaniyyahi’ti.
dn14:2.2.11: ‘Evam, deva’ti kho, bhikkhave, sarathi vipassissa kumarassa patissutva tatova antepuram paccaniyyasi.
dn14:2.2.12: Tatra sudam, bhikkhave, vipassi kumaro antepuram gato dukkhi dummano pajjhayati:
dn14:2.2.13: ‘dhiratthu kira, bho, jati nama, yatra hi nama jatassa jara pannayissati’ti.
dn14:2.3.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, bandhuma raja sarathim amantapetva etadavoca:
dn14:2.3.2: ‘kacci, samma sarathi, kumaro uyyanabhumiya abhiramittha? Kacci, samma sarathi, kumaro uyyanabhumiya attamano ahosi’ti?
dn14:2.3.3: ‘Na kho, deva, kumaro uyyanabhumiya abhiramittha, na kho, deva, kumaro uyyanabhumiya attamano ahosi’ti.
dn14:2.3.4: ‘Kim pana, samma sarathi, addasa kumaro uyyanabhumim niyyanto’ti?
dn14:2.3.5: ‘Addasa kho, deva, kumaro uyyanabhumim niyyanto purisam jinnam gopanasivankam bhoggam dandaparayanam pavedhamanam gacchantam aturam gatayobbanam.
dn14:2.3.7: “ayam pana, samma sarathi, puriso kinkato, kesapissa na yatha annesam, kayopissa na yatha annesan”ti?
dn14:2.3.10: “Eso kho, deva, jinno nama na dani tena ciram jivitabbam bhavissati”ti.
dn14:2.3.11: “Kim pana, samma sarathi, ahampi jaradhammo, jaram anatito”ti?
dn14:2.3.12: “Tvanca, deva, mayancamha sabbe jaradhamma, jaram anatita”ti.
dn14:2.3.13: “Tena hi, samma sarathi, alam danajja uyyanabhumiya, itova antepuram paccaniyyahi”ti.
dn14:2.3.14: “Evam, deva”ti kho aham, deva, vipassissa kumarassa patissutva tatova antepuram paccaniyyasim.
dn14:2.3.15: So kho, deva, kumaro antepuram gato dukkhi dummano pajjhayati:
dn14:2.3.16: “dhiratthu kira, bho, jati nama, yatra hi nama jatassa jara pannayissati”’ti.

dn14:2.4.2: ‘Ma heva kho vipassi kumaro na rajjam karesi, ma heva vipassi kumaro agarasma anagariyam pabbaji, ma heva nemittanam brahmananam saccam assa vacanan’ti.
dn14:2.4.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, bandhuma raja vipassissa kumarassa bhiyyoso mattaya panca kamagunani upatthapesi:
dn14:2.4.4: ‘yatha vipassi kumaro rajjam kareyya, yatha vipassi kumaro na agarasma anagariyam pabbajeyya, yatha nemittanam brahmananam miccha assa vacanan’ti.
dn14:2.4.5: Tatra sudam, bhikkhave, vipassi kumaro pancahi kamagunehi samappito samangibhuto paricareti.

dn14:2.6.4: Akkhinipissa na yatha annesam, saropissa na yatha annesan’ti?

dn14:2.10.1: Addasa kho, bhikkhave, vipassi kumaro uyyanabhumim niyyanto mahajanakayam sannipatitam nanarattananca dussanam vilatam kayiramanam.
dn14:2.10.3: ‘kim nu kho so, samma sarathi, mahajanakayo sannipatito nanarattananca dussanam vilatam kayirati’ti?
dn14:2.10.5: ‘Tena hi, samma sarathi, yena so kalankato tena ratham pesehi’ti.
dn14:2.10.6: ‘Evam, deva’ti kho, bhikkhave, sarathi vipassissa kumarassa patissutva yena so kalankato tena ratham pesesi.
dn14:2.10.7: Addasa kho, bhikkhave, vipassi kumaro petam kalankatam, disva sarathim amantesi:
dn14:2.10.9: ‘Eso kho, deva, kalankato nama. Na dani tam dakkhanti mata va pita va anne va natisalohita, sopi na dakkhissati mataram va pitaram va anne va natisalohite’ti.
dn14:2.10.10: ‘Kim pana, samma sarathi, ahampi maranadhammo maranam anatito;
dn14:2.10.11: mampi na dakkhanti devo va devi va anne va natisalohita;
dn14:2.10.12: ahampi na dakkhissami devam va devim va anne va natisalohite’ti?
dn14:2.10.13: ‘Tvanca, deva, mayancamha sabbe maranadhamma maranam anatita;
dn14:2.10.14: tampi na dakkhanti devo va devi va anne va natisalohita;
dn14:2.10.15: tvampi na dakkhissasi devam va devim va anne va natisalohite’ti.
dn14:2.10.16: ‘Tena hi, samma sarathi, alam danajja uyyanabhumiya, itova antepuram paccaniyyahi’ti.
dn14:2.10.17: ‘Evam, deva’ti kho, bhikkhave, sarathi vipassissa kumarassa patissutva tatova antepuram paccaniyyasi.
dn14:2.10.18: Tatra sudam, bhikkhave, vipassi kumaro antepuram gato dukkhi dummano pajjhayati:
dn14:2.10.19: ‘dhiratthu kira, bho, jati nama, yatra hi nama jatassa jara pannayissati, byadhi pannayissati, maranam pannayissati’ti.
dn14:2.11.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, bandhuma raja sarathim amantapetva etadavoca:
dn14:2.11.2: ‘kacci, samma sarathi, kumaro uyyanabhumiya abhiramittha, kacci, samma sarathi, kumaro uyyanabhumiya attamano ahosi’ti?
dn14:2.11.3: ‘Na kho, deva, kumaro uyyanabhumiya abhiramittha, na kho, deva, kumaro uyyanabhumiya attamano ahosi’ti.
dn14:2.11.4: ‘Kim pana, samma sarathi, addasa kumaro uyyanabhumim niyyanto’ti?
dn14:2.11.5: ‘Addasa kho, deva, kumaro uyyanabhumim niyyanto mahajanakayam sannipatitam nanarattananca dussanam vilatam kayiramanam.
dn14:2.11.7: “kim nu kho so, samma sarathi, mahajanakayo sannipatito nanarattananca dussanam vilatam kayirati”ti?
dn14:2.11.9: “Tena hi, samma sarathi, yena so kalankato tena ratham pesehi”ti.
dn14:2.11.10: “Evam, deva”ti kho aham, deva, vipassissa kumarassa patissutva yena so kalankato tena ratham pesesim.
dn14:2.11.11: Addasa kho, deva, kumaro petam kalankatam, disva mam etadavoca:
dn14:2.11.14: Na dani tam dakkhanti mata va pita va anne va natisalohita, sopi na dakkhissati mataram va pitaram va anne va natisalohite”ti.
dn14:2.11.15: “Kim pana, samma sarathi, ahampi maranadhammo maranam anatito;
dn14:2.11.16: mampi na dakkhanti devo va devi va anne va natisalohita;
dn14:2.11.17: ahampi na dakkhissami devam va devim va anne va natisalohite”ti?
dn14:2.11.18: “Tvanca, deva, mayancamha sabbe maranadhamma maranam anatita;
dn14:2.11.19: tampi na dakkhanti devo va devi va anne va natisalohita, tvampi na dakkhissasi devam va devim va anne va natisalohite”ti.
dn14:2.11.20: “Tena hi, samma sarathi, alam danajja uyyanabhumiya, itova antepuram paccaniyyahi”ti.
dn14:2.11.21: “Evam, deva”ti kho aham, deva, vipassissa kumarassa patissutva tatova antepuram paccaniyyasim.
dn14:2.11.22: So kho, deva, kumaro antepuram gato dukkhi dummano pajjhayati:
dn14:2.11.23: “dhiratthu kira, bho, jati nama, yatra hi nama jatassa jara pannayissati, byadhi pannayissati, maranam pannayissati”’ti.
dn14:2.12.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, bandhumassa ranno etadahosi:
dn14:2.12.2: ‘ma heva kho vipassi kumaro na rajjam karesi, ma heva vipassi kumaro agarasma anagariyam pabbaji, ma heva nemittanam brahmananam saccam assa vacanan’ti.
dn14:2.12.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, bandhuma raja vipassissa kumarassa bhiyyoso mattaya panca kamagunani upatthapesi:
dn14:2.12.4: ‘yatha vipassi kumaro rajjam kareyya, yatha vipassi kumaro na agarasma anagariyam pabbajeyya, yatha nemittanam brahmananam miccha assa vacanan’ti.
dn14:2.13.1: Tatra sudam, bhikkhave, vipassi kumaro pancahi kamagunehi samappito samangibhuto paricareti.
dn14:2.13.2: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassi kumaro bahunam vassanam bahunam vassasatanam bahunam vassasahassanam accayena sarathim amantesi:
dn14:2.13.3: ‘yojehi, samma sarathi, bhaddani bhaddani yanani, uyyanabhumim gacchama subhumidassanaya’ti.
dn14:2.13.4: ‘Evam, deva’ti kho, bhikkhave, sarathi vipassissa kumarassa patissutva bhaddani bhaddani yanani yojetva vipassissa kumarassa pativedesi:
dn14:2.13.5: ‘yuttani kho te, deva, bhaddani bhaddani yanani,
dn14:2.13.7: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassi kumaro bhaddam bhaddam yanam abhiruhitva bhaddehi bhaddehi yanehi uyyanabhumim niyyasi.
dn14:2.14.1: Addasa kho, bhikkhave, vipassi kumaro uyyanabhumim niyyanto purisam bhandum pabbajitam kasayavasanam.
dn14:2.14.4: Sisampissa na yatha annesam, vatthanipissa na yatha annesan’ti?
dn14:2.14.7: ‘Eso kho, deva, pabbajito nama sadhu dhammacariya sadhu samacariya sadhu kusalakiriya sadhu punnakiriya sadhu avihimsa sadhu bhutanukampa’ti.
dn14:2.14.8: ‘Sadhu kho so, samma sarathi, pabbajito nama, sadhu dhammacariya sadhu samacariya sadhu kusalakiriya sadhu punnakiriya sadhu avihimsa sadhu bhutanukampa.
dn14:2.14.9: Tena hi, samma sarathi, yena so pabbajito tena ratham pesehi’ti.
dn14:2.14.10: ‘Evam, deva’ti kho, bhikkhave, sarathi vipassissa kumarassa patissutva yena so pabbajito tena ratham pesesi.
dn14:2.14.11: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassi kumaro tam pabbajitam etadavoca:
dn14:2.14.13: sisampi te na yatha annesam, vatthanipi te na yatha annesan’ti?
dn14:2.14.16: ‘Aham kho, deva, pabbajito nama, sadhu dhammacariya sadhu samacariya sadhu kusalakiriya sadhu punnakiriya sadhu avihimsa sadhu bhutanukampa’ti.
dn14:2.14.17: ‘Sadhu kho tvam, samma, pabbajito nama sadhu dhammacariya sadhu samacariya sadhu kusalakiriya sadhu punnakiriya sadhu avihimsa sadhu bhutanukampa’ti.
dn14:2.15.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassi kumaro sarathim amantesi:
dn14:2.15.2: ‘tena hi, samma sarathi, ratham adaya itova antepuram paccaniyyahi.
dn14:2.15.3: Aham pana idheva kesamassum oharetva kasayani vatthani acchadetva agarasma anagariyam pabbajissami’ti.
dn14:2.15.4: ‘Evam, deva’ti kho, bhikkhave, sarathi vipassissa kumarassa patissutva ratham adaya tatova antepuram paccaniyyasi.
dn14:2.15.5: Vipassi pana kumaro tattheva kesamassum oharetva kasayani vatthani acchadetva agarasma anagariyam pabbaji.
dn14:2.16.1: Assosi kho, bhikkhave, bandhumatiya rajadhaniya mahajanakayo caturasitipanasahassani:
dn14:2.16.2: ‘vipassi kira kumaro kesamassum oharetva kasayani vatthani acchadetva agarasma anagariyam pabbajito’ti.
dn14:2.16.4: ‘na hi nuna so orako dhammavinayo, na sa oraka pabbajja, yattha vipassi kumaro kesamassum oharetva kasayani vatthani acchadetva agarasma anagariyam pabbajito.
dn14:2.16.5: Vipassipi nama kumaro kesamassum oharetva kasayani vatthani acchadetva agarasma anagariyam pabbajissati, kimangam pana mayan’ti.
dn14:2.16.6: Atha kho, so bhikkhave, mahajanakayo caturasitipanasahassani kesamassum oharetva kasayani vatthani acchadetva vipassim bodhisattam agarasma anagariyam pabbajitam anupabbajimsu.
dn14:2.16.7: Taya sudam, bhikkhave, parisaya parivuto vipassi bodhisatto gamanigamajanapadarajadhanisu carikam carati.
dn14:2.17.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa rahogatassa patisallinassa evam cetaso parivitakko udapadi:
dn14:2.17.2: ‘na kho metam patirupam yoham akinno viharami, yannunaham eko ganamha vupakattho vihareyyan’ti.
dn14:2.17.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassi bodhisatto aparena samayena eko ganamha vupakattho vihasi, anneneva tani caturasitipabbajitasahassani agamamsu, annena maggena vipassi bodhisatto.
dn14:2.18.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa vasupagatassa rahogatassa patisallinassa evam cetaso parivitakko udapadi:
dn14:2.18.2: ‘kiccham vatayam loko apanno, jayati ca jiyati ca miyati ca cavati ca upapajjati ca, atha ca panimassa dukkhassa nissaranam nappajanati jaramaranassa,
dn14:2.18.3: kudassu nama imassa dukkhassa nissaranam pannayissati jaramaranassa’ti?
dn14:2.18.4: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
dn14:2.18.5: ‘kimhi nu kho sati jaramaranam hoti, kimpaccaya jaramaranan’ti?
dn14:2.18.6: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.18.7: ‘jatiya kho sati jaramaranam hoti, jatipaccaya jaramaranan’ti.
dn14:2.18.8: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
dn14:2.18.9: ‘kimhi nu kho sati jati hoti, kimpaccaya jati’ti?
dn14:2.18.10: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.18.11: ‘bhave kho sati jati hoti, bhavapaccaya jati’ti.
dn14:2.18.12: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
dn14:2.18.13: ‘kimhi nu kho sati bhavo hoti, kimpaccaya bhavo’ti?
dn14:2.18.14: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.18.15: ‘upadane kho sati bhavo hoti, upadanapaccaya bhavo’ti.
dn14:2.18.16: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
dn14:2.18.17: ‘kimhi nu kho sati upadanam hoti, kimpaccaya upadanan’ti?
dn14:2.18.18: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.18.19: ‘tanhaya kho sati upadanam hoti, tanhapaccaya upadanan’ti.
dn14:2.18.20: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
dn14:2.18.21: ‘kimhi nu kho sati tanha hoti, kimpaccaya tanha’ti?
dn14:2.18.22: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.18.23: ‘vedanaya kho sati tanha hoti, vedanapaccaya tanha’ti.
dn14:2.18.24: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
dn14:2.18.25: ‘kimhi nu kho sati vedana hoti, kimpaccaya vedana’ti?
dn14:2.18.26: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.18.27: ‘phasse kho sati vedana hoti, phassapaccaya vedana’ti.
dn14:2.18.28: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
dn14:2.18.29: ‘kimhi nu kho sati phasso hoti, kimpaccaya phasso’ti?
dn14:2.18.30: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.18.31: ‘salayatane kho sati phasso hoti, salayatanapaccaya phasso’ti.
dn14:2.18.32: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
dn14:2.18.33: ‘kimhi nu kho sati salayatanam hoti, kimpaccaya salayatanan’ti?
dn14:2.18.34: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.18.35: ‘namarupe kho sati salayatanam hoti, namarupapaccaya salayatanan’ti.
dn14:2.18.36: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
dn14:2.18.37: ‘kimhi nu kho sati namarupam hoti, kimpaccaya namarupan’ti?
dn14:2.18.38: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.18.39: ‘vinnane kho sati namarupam hoti, vinnanapaccaya namarupan’ti.
dn14:2.18.40: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
dn14:2.18.41: ‘kimhi nu kho sati vinnanam hoti, kimpaccaya vinnanan’ti?
dn14:2.18.42: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.18.43: ‘namarupe kho sati vinnanam hoti, namarupapaccaya vinnanan’ti.
dn14:2.19.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
dn14:2.19.2: ‘paccudavattati kho idam vinnanam namarupamha, naparam gacchati.
dn14:2.19.3: Ettavata jayetha va jiyyetha va miyyetha va cavetha va upapajjetha va, yadidam
dn14:2.19.4: namarupapaccaya vinnanam, vinnanapaccaya namarupam, namarupapaccaya salayatanam, salayatanapaccaya phasso, phassapaccaya vedana, vedanapaccaya tanha, tanhapaccaya upadanam, upadanapaccaya bhavo, bhavapaccaya jati, jatipaccaya jaramaranam sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa sambhavanti.
dn14:2.19.6: ‘Samudayo samudayo’ti kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi, nanam udapadi, panna udapadi, vijja udapadi, aloko udapadi.
dn14:2.20.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
dn14:2.20.2: ‘kimhi nu kho asati jaramaranam na hoti, kissa nirodha jaramarananirodho’ti?
dn14:2.20.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.20.4: ‘jatiya kho asati jaramaranam na hoti, jatinirodha jaramarananirodho’ti.
dn14:2.20.5: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
dn14:2.20.6: ‘kimhi nu kho asati jati na hoti, kissa nirodha jatinirodho’ti?
dn14:2.20.7: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.20.8: ‘bhave kho asati jati na hoti, bhavanirodha jatinirodho’ti.
dn14:2.20.9: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
dn14:2.20.10: ‘kimhi nu kho asati bhavo na hoti, kissa nirodha bhavanirodho’ti?
dn14:2.20.11: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.20.12: ‘upadane kho asati bhavo na hoti, upadananirodha bhavanirodho’ti.
dn14:2.20.13: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
dn14:2.20.14: ‘kimhi nu kho asati upadanam na hoti, kissa nirodha upadananirodho’ti?
dn14:2.20.15: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.20.16: ‘tanhaya kho asati upadanam na hoti, tanhanirodha upadananirodho’ti.
dn14:2.20.17: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
dn14:2.20.18: ‘kimhi nu kho asati tanha na hoti, kissa nirodha tanhanirodho’ti?
dn14:2.20.19: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.20.20: ‘vedanaya kho asati tanha na hoti, vedananirodha tanhanirodho’ti.
dn14:2.20.21: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
dn14:2.20.22: ‘kimhi nu kho asati vedana na hoti, kissa nirodha vedananirodho’ti?
dn14:2.20.23: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.20.24: ‘phasse kho asati vedana na hoti, phassanirodha vedananirodho’ti.
dn14:2.20.25: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
dn14:2.20.26: ‘kimhi nu kho asati phasso na hoti, kissa nirodha phassanirodho’ti?
dn14:2.20.27: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.20.28: ‘salayatane kho asati phasso na hoti, salayatananirodha phassanirodho’ti.
dn14:2.20.29: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
dn14:2.20.30: ‘kimhi nu kho asati salayatanam na hoti, kissa nirodha salayatananirodho’ti?
dn14:2.20.31: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.20.32: ‘namarupe kho asati salayatanam na hoti, namarupanirodha salayatananirodho’ti.
dn14:2.20.33: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
dn14:2.20.34: ‘kimhi nu kho asati namarupam na hoti, kissa nirodha namarupanirodho’ti?
dn14:2.20.35: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.20.36: ‘vinnane kho asati namarupam na hoti, vinnananirodha namarupanirodho’ti.
dn14:2.20.37: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
dn14:2.20.38: ‘kimhi nu kho asati vinnanam na hoti, kissa nirodha vinnananirodho’ti?
dn14:2.20.39: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikara ahu pannaya abhisamayo:
dn14:2.20.40: ‘namarupe kho asati vinnanam na hoti, namarupanirodha vinnananirodho’ti.
dn14:2.21.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
dn14:2.21.3: namarupanirodha vinnananirodho, vinnananirodha namarupanirodho, namarupanirodha salayatananirodho, salayatananirodha phassanirodho, phassanirodha vedananirodho, vedananirodha tanhanirodho, tanhanirodha upadananirodho, upadananirodha bhavanirodho, bhavanirodha jatinirodho, jatinirodha jaramaranam sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa nirujjhanti.
dn14:2.21.5: ‘Nirodho nirodho’ti kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi, nanam udapadi, panna udapadi, vijja udapadi, aloko udapadi.
dn14:2.22.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassi bodhisatto aparena samayena pancasu upadanakkhandhesu udayabbayanupassi vihasi:
dn14:2.22.2: ‘iti rupam, iti rupassa samudayo, iti rupassa atthangamo;
dn14:2.22.3: iti vedana, iti vedanaya samudayo, iti vedanaya atthangamo;
dn14:2.22.4: iti sanna, iti sannaya samudayo, iti sannaya atthangamo;
dn14:2.22.5: iti sankhara, iti sankharanam samudayo, iti sankharanam atthangamo;
dn14:2.22.6: iti vinnanam, iti vinnanassa samudayo, iti vinnanassa atthangamo’ti,
dn14:2.22.7: tassa pancasu upadanakkhandhesu udayabbayanupassino viharato na cirasseva anupadaya asavehi cittam vimucciti.
dn14:3.1.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bhagavato arahato sammasambuddhassa etadahosi:
dn14:3.1.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bhagavato arahato sammasambuddhassa etadahosi:
dn14:3.1.4: ‘adhigato kho myayam dhammo gambhiro duddaso duranubodho santo panito atakkavacaro nipuno panditavedaniyo.
dn14:3.1.5: Alayarama kho panayam paja alayarata alayasammudita.
dn14:3.1.6: Alayaramaya kho pana pajaya alayarataya alayasammuditaya duddasam idam thanam yadidam idappaccayatapaticcasamuppado.
dn14:3.1.7: Idampi kho thanam duddasam yadidam sabbasankharasamatho sabbupadhipatinissaggo tanhakkhayo virago nirodho nibbanam.
dn14:3.1.8: Ahanceva kho pana dhammam deseyyam, pare ca me na ajaneyyum; so mamassa kilamatho, sa mamassa vihesa’ti.
dn14:3.2.1: Apissu, bhikkhave, vipassim bhagavantam arahantam sammasambuddham ima anacchariya gathayo patibhamsu pubbe assutapubba:
dn14:3.2.10: Itiha, bhikkhave, vipassissa bhagavato arahato sammasambuddhassa patisancikkhato appossukkataya cittam nami, no dhammadesanaya.
dn14:3.2.11: Atha kho, bhikkhave, annatarassa mahabrahmuno vipassissa bhagavato arahato sammasambuddhassa cetasa cetoparivitakkamannaya etadahosi:
dn14:3.2.12: ‘nassati vata bho loko, vinassati vata bho loko, yatra hi nama vipassissa bhagavato arahato sammasambuddhassa appossukkataya cittam namati, no dhammadesanaya’ti.
